DOC.brief_title: Salpingectomy Versus Aspiration Hydrosalpingeal Fluid Prior IVF-ET
DOC.detailed_description: The adverse impact hydrosalpinx vitro fertilisation embryo transfer ( IVF-ET ) outcomes confirmed several retrospective prospective study . Cochrane review prospective randomise trial laparoscopic salpingectomy confirm beneficial effect laparoscopic salpingectomy IVF-ET outcome patient hydrosalpinges . Surgery usually safe especially patient extensive adhesion , morbid obesity previous multiple laparotomy . Furthermore , many infertile couple refuse undergo bilateral salpingectomy proximal tubal occlusion procedure remove hope spontaneous pregnancy . Other less invasive option patient hydrosalpinges ultrasound-guided aspiration hydrosalpingeal fluid , antibiotic ( alone combine aspiration ) hysteroscopic occlusion fallopian tube study order find alternative salpingectomy . Although method simple get popular , current data inadequate recommend treatment option instead salpingectomy support evidence method come small retrospective study . A recent randomized control trial reveal aspiration hydrosalpingeal fluid time oocyte retrieval associate improved implantation rate pregnancy rate . The aim randomize control trial compare efficacy ultrasound guided aspiration hydrosalpingeal fluid salpingectomy management patient ultrasound visible hydrosalpinges undergo IVF-ET
DOC.criteria: Patients unilateral bilateral hydrosalpinges visible ultrasound Age 18 37 year Period infertility > 1 year Body mass index 1929 Normal basal luteinizing hormone ( LH ) , follicle stimulate hormone ( FSH ) prolactin concentration . Normal recent semen analysis ( accord World Health Organization criterion ) . Uterine fibroid require surgical removal . Endometriosis . Male factor infertility require ICSI , Previous IVF cycle . History recurrent miscarriage . Endocrinologic disorder . Presence systemic disease contraindicate pregnancy .
